title: 366-Your Mom's House with Christina Pazsitzky and Tom Segura
description: This week, the mommies watch a bunch of public service announcements, some hilarious, some horrible. They also get a translation for the Persian voicemail, which kicks us off to a journey into Christina's childhood. Wipe down!
